mapper.select: SELECT tb_user_id AS userId, tp.* FROM travel_product tp WHERE (tp.name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR tp.description LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND tp.country_id = #{countryId} ORDER BY tp.like DESC

SELECT tp.*, c.* FROM travel_product tp LEFT JOIN country c ON tp.country_id = c.id WHERE (tp.name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR tp.description LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR c.country LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR c.city LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
select tp.tb_user_id as userId, tp.*, c.* from travel_product tp left join country c on tp.country_id = c.id where tp.id = #{productId}
SELECT tp.*, c.*, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY c.id) AS cityCount FROM travel_product tp LEFT JOIN country c ON tp.country_id = c.id WHERE tp.tb_user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.country, c.city;
mapper.insert: insert into travel_product (name, description, cost, tb_user_id, country_id) values (#{productName}, #{description}, #{cost}, #{userId}, #{countryId})
